articles.title: Reliance General Insurance sent GST notices for ₹922 crore by DGGI | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Of the four notices, one pertains to the GST of  ₹478.84 crore, applicable as tax on re-insurance commission booked through the re-insurance services ceded to various Indian and foreign entities, reports said, citing sources.

articles.title: No petrol, diesel price hike likely despite crude oil price surge, says Moody's - Hindustan Times
articles.description: International oil prices have firmed up since August, leading to margins of three retailers turning negative again
articles.content:
Petrol and diesel prices are unlikely to be increased despite firming raw material costs because of upcoming general elections next year, Moody's Investors Service said.
